name: Mini Slime Invasion
description:
Created for the first Mini-Jam with Godot Engine.

Play

  • Shoot the slimes to earn score
  • Avoid touching them
  • Beat anothers highscore

Theme / Rules

  • Max. 4 colors
  • 128x128 screen size
  • Theme: "Breakout"

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse cursor to aim
  • LMButton to shoot
